text: The Vindicator (also known as Frankenstein '88 and known in Brazil as Roboman) is a 1986 Canadian science fiction thriller movie directed by Jean-Claude Lord and starring Richard Cox, David McIlwraith, Teri Austin, Pam Grier, Maury Chaykin. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * IMDb Category:1986 thriller movies Category:1986 science fiction movies Category:Canadian science fiction movies Category:Canadian thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Jean-Claude Lord Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: The Vindicator (movie)
